protein.specific_function: Acts as an inhibitor of BTK tyrosine kinase activity, thereby playing a role in B-cell development. Down-regulates BTK kinase activity, leading to interference with BTK-mediated calcium mobilization and NF-kappa-B-driven transcription

Nucleic Acids Res. 2008 Aug;36(13):4402-16. Epub 2008 Jul 2.
